topic.title: EMS Advance Directives Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67840-9" EMS Advance Directives Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10191)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Advance Directives Section"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10193)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67516-5" Advanced directive (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10194)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.05
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Advanced Directive Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67840-9" EMS Advance Directives Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10191)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Advance Directives Section"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10193)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67516-5" Advanced directive (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10194)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.05
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Advanced Directive Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
